items.summary: Update the text content of the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]/span[1] to exactly: "About Us".

Add an "Industry 4.0" solution card to the Solutions page, using the same design/layout as existing Solution cards and using the same title/description/icon/content as the Home page "Our Solutions" Industry 4.0 element; ensure it appears at the end of the Solutions grid when viewing /solutions with default filters.
